content: NEW YORK/BOSTON  Aug 11 Legg Mason Inc's Bill Miller  whose mutual fund beat the S&P 500 handily for 15 consecutive years at the turn of the century  is riding off into the sunset after his recent lagging returns left a trail of disappointed investors.
name: Legg Mason Inc
title: UPDATE 2-RPT-Legg Mason's Bill Miller leaves firm amid faded glory

content: Global asset manager Legg Mason Inc  is in talks to buy a majority stake in real estate investment manager Clarion Partners LLC in a deal valuing the company at about $850 million  Bloomberg reported.
name: Legg Mason Inc
title: Legg Mason in talks to buy Clarion Partners: Bloomberg

content: Jan 4 Global asset manager Legg Mason Inc  is in talks to buy a majority stake in real estate investment manager Clarion Partners LLC in a deal valuing the company at about $850 million  Bloomberg reported.
name: Legg Mason Inc
title: Legg Mason in talks to buy Clarion Partners - Bloomberg

content: Nov 19 Private equity firm Lightyear Capital is looking to sell its majority stake in real estate investment manager Clarion Partners LLC for around $800 million  people familiar with the sales talks said this week.
name: Legg Mason Inc
title: REFILE-Most of real estate firm Clarion Partners on the block -sources

content: NEW YORK  June 28 Legg Mason Inc's share price does not fully reflect the asset manager's sharply improved financial prospects and could climb 20 percent or more over the next year  according to the June 29 edition of Barron's.
name: Legg Mason Inc
title: Legg Mason shares could gain another 20 pct or more - Barron's
